Combining Items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: Monster Rancher DS FAQ: Item Lists: Combining Items
By Thorr on Sunday, August 8, 2010 - 09:13 am:

These are for use when combining monsters in order to create a monster of the specified type. These items are obtained through the various tasks to unlock the breeds.

ItemFunction
None (Ninja sword)Create Zan
King's ProofCreate Xenon
Dragon FangCreate Dragon
Fire FeatherCreate Phoenix
Gali MaskCreate Gali
Naga NailCreate Naga
Cursed MaskCreate Joker
Ancient SwordCreate Durahan
PupaCreate Beaklon
Ancient WeaponCreate Henger
Knight's LanceCreate Centaur
Mini MonolithCreate Monol


The Slate Fragments for each monster are acquired in tournaments and are used to enable your monster to have stats beyond 999. You must use the appropriate fragment for the main breed of your new monster. Here is the complete schedule for the chips -

BreedClassMonthWeek
AbyssS13
BakuA83
BeaklonSS52
CentaurSS122
ColorpandoraA111
DragonSS72
DurahanSS82
DuckenA33
FalcoS121
GaliSS62
GolemS91
HareS31
HengerSS22
JokerSS42
LesioneS73
MewA22
MocchiA44
MonolSS112
NagaSS12
OgyoA61
PanchoA72
PhoenixSS92
PiroroS103
PixieS43
PlantA11
SuezoA94
TigerS 61
XenonSS32
ZanSS102


We know that slate fragments can be used in combination to create an overdrive monster, but thanks to a convenient glitch in the game, you can also feed them to your monsters; By feeding your monster something it can eat, then selecting the frag you want, your monster will eat it too. It won't turn it into an overdrive monster, but it will give it a special talent associated with the breed. -GM

Slate Frag BreedTalentDescriptionUse
AbyssLivelyLife rises more rapidly during training and drills.Training and Drills
BakuPeppyFatigue won't build up as quickly during training or drills.Training and Drills
BeaklonFuryTriggered on occasion when taking an opponent's Critical attack, raising attack power but lowering Defense.Battle
Centaurdoes nothing
ColorpandoraSavvySkill rises more rapidly during training and drills.Training and Drills
DragonWrathWhen taking a hit from the opponent while its talent is triggered, Power increases greatly but Defense drops. This can happen only once per match.Battle
DurahanGritIf you have a lot of guts when KOd you survive with 1 life instead.Battle
DuckenToughDefense rises more rapidly during training and drills.Training and Drills
FalcoRageTriggered on occasion when Guts are low, causing Guts Power and Guts Recovery Speed to rise.Battle
GaliMuscleTemporarily increases Power and Speed,decreases Defense in battle; triggered when dodging a series of attacks.Battle
GolemBrainyIncrease Int growth.Training and Drills
HarePunchyBreeding effects for all parameters rise during training and drills, but Fatigue builds up more rapidly.Training and Drills
HengerFocusTemporarily increases Skill in battle, but increases guts costs for all attacks; triggered when using a tech with lots of guts saved up.Battle
JokerMoxieTriggered on occasion when taking an attack while Guts are low, causing Defense and Move Speed to rise.Battle
LesioneNo ProbSometimes triggered when landing a series of normal or Critical hits, causing Move Speed and Guts Recovery Speed to rise, but also causing Defense to drop.Battle
MewCool<CALM AND COLLECTED> Less stress is built up while training and doing drills.Training and Drills
MocchiHyperTemporarily increases movement speed; triggered when landing the first attack in battle.Battle
Monoldoes nothing
Nagadoes nothing
OgyoBrawnyIncreases effectiveness of Power training.Training and Drills
PanchoTouchyImproves training for all stats, but stress increases.Training and Drills
PhoenixCrushTriggered at times when the opponent's Life is reduced, causing Power, Defense, Critical Rate and Guts Recovery Speed to rise. But soon after they'll all plummet.Battle
PiroroFightWhen Life is low, attack power will increase, but only for one attack per match.Battle
PixieWarrior's SpiritImproves training for all stats, fatigue and stress is reduced.Training and Drills
PlantFire UpTemporarily increases movement speed and guts recovery rate in battle, but causes damage to be taken more often; triggered when missing or taking multiple hits from the enemy.Battle
SuezoQuickSpeed raises more rapidly during training and drills.Training and Drills
TigerWildTriggered on occasion when losing and there's not much time left, causing Critical attacks to occur more often.Battle
XenonGeniusTriggered on occasion when dodging a series of attacks, causing Intelligence and Speed to rise, but also causing Defense to drop.Battle
ZanSpunkTriggered on occasion when taking a series of attacks, causing Defense and Guts Recovery Speed to rise, but also causing power to drop.Battle


(Item names are subject to updating)

Last chart thanks to: GM, Thorr, marhawkman, Shen the Keeper!
